title: Rebirth of Chen An - Novel Updates
genre: Action   Comedy   Drama   Harem   Mature   Psychological   Romance   Supernatural   Yaoi
tags: Appearance Changes   Arms Dealers   Calm Protagonist   Charismatic Protagonist   Clever Protagonist   Confident Protagonist   Confinement   Death of Loved Ones   Doting Love Interests   Fat to Fit   Firearms   Handsome Male Lead   Male Yandere   Manipulative Characters   Modern Day   Organized Crime   Police   Possessive Characters   R*pe Victim Becomes Lover   Reincarnation   R*pe   Suicides   Transmigration   Younger Love Interests
author: Wan Mie Zhi Shang   万灭之殤
description:
The notorious firearms crime lord Chen Zhang An a.k.a Old Fox was placed under house arrest by the very successor he groomed.

He thus ended his own life with a bullet right in front of Lu Feng, only to open his eyes and realise that he became an obese, myopic, bucktoothed, broke and abandoned loser.

Well that loser is gone; let Uncle Chen teach you what it means to be a real winner in life.>
